message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you the chance to acquire a product that I believe will be incredibly valuable to your business.  While I value it at no less than $800,000, I'm willing to let it go for $1,200,000. This price represents a significant gain for you, considering its true value to your operations.  Think carefully about this offer, as I'm confident you won't find a better deal. Let me know your decision.
